snippet.title: Guest Post: Why A Finite World Is A Problem
snippet.description:
* Guest Post: Why A Finite World Is A Problem answers: 1. A finite world is a problem because we and all of the other creatures living in this world share the same piece […] preferred by desirable insects, such as bees. 2. A finite world is governed by cycles. We like to project in straight lines […] or as constant percentage increases, but the real world doesn’t follow such patterns. Each day has 24 hours. Water moves
15 weeks ago
